biotools.summary:
Interactive NMF-based decomposition workflow of genome-scale datasets.

ShinyButchR is an interactive R/Shiny app to perform NMF on an input matrix. ShinyButchR uses ButchR (https://github.com/wurst-theke/ButchR) to run the matrix decomposition and generate diagnostic plots and visualizations that helps to find association of the NMF signatures to known biological factors.

ButchR is an R package providing functions to perform non-negative matrix factorization and postprocessing using TensorFlow.

bioschemas.name: ShinyButchR
bioschemas.summary:
Interactive NMF-based decomposition workflow of genome-scale datasets.

ShinyButchR is an interactive R/Shiny app to perform NMF on an input matrix. ShinyButchR uses ButchR (https://github.com/wurst-theke/ButchR) to run the matrix decomposition and generate diagnostic plots and visualizations that helps to find association of the NMF signatures to known biological factors.

ButchR is an R package providing functions to perform non-negative matrix factorization and postprocessing using TensorFlow.
